1.2.name: wordpress/ultimate-google-fonts
1.2.description: With this Google fonts plugin you have more than awesame 90 open source fonts at your disposal! Choose and customize Google fonts directly from your Wordpress admin panel! Enable only font you really want to use! Check text effects examples direcly in your admin panel. Text that use beautiful Google fonts is selectable. For more info and examples of text effects go to the Ultimate Google Fonts's page.
